title: Emails: Interacting with an Email
body:
Emails: Interacting with an Email¶

You can not create an email directly through Automation. Rather, Emails keeps a record of emails that have been created, and allows you to design/edit these existing emails.
You can create a new email through other sections of the Maha Platform, such as templates .

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Automation

  3. Click Emails

  4. Click an email to view details, an audit trail, and comments

  5. Click the image to pull up a larger version of the email in a separate tab

  6. Click and Edit Email to edit the email

  7. Click and Design Email to design the email

  8. Click and Convert to Template to convert the email to a template

  9. Click and Delete Email to delete the email

  10. Click Design Email to edit the current email

  11. Click Performance to view contact and email interaction data
